positions.title: Recruiting Specialist
positions.description_html:
â€¢Manage the team's governance and performance
â€¢Understand the level of risk & propose mitigation plans and partner with other support teams to resolve requests/issues in a timely manner

positions.subtitle: Accenture
positions.description: â€¢Oversee the work related to the sourcing, scheduling and pipeline movement and manage a team of resources dedicated on daily basisâ€¢Supervise a dedicated team of Talent Coaches/Sourcers (Lead team of 12 Sourcers) and is accountable for their operational performanceâ€¢Accountable for the delivery on the Recruiting Plan. Work closely with HRSS teams to ensure adequate EI slots, CV sourcing and pipeline movement respectivelyâ€¢Engage business leads/Project leads on regular basis to resolve and clarify any recruitment delivery issuesâ€¢Support  Recruitment Delivery Lead (DL) for achieving the Recruitment leadership prioritiesâ€¢Track, identify and ensure productivity and business metrics for each functionâ€¢Support DL/Supervisor with Insights, regular reports and recommendations to manage escalationsâ€¢Plan for special recruitment drives in collaboration with Business Leads and Supervisorâ€™s guidance to meet targetsâ€¢Plan and focus on achieving our key metrics like Diversity, Employee Referrals, Renege management, PwD hiring, Alumni hiring etcACHIEVEMENT:â€¢Successfully met the Media target as a Lead for Q1 (before moving to new role)â€¢Implemented Digital JD to drive applicants for complex role (Initiative executed first time for the entity)
positions.title: Recruiting Specialist (Manager)
positions.description_html:
â€¢Oversee the work related to the sourcing, scheduling and pipeline movement and manage a team of resources dedicated on daily basis
â€¢Supervise a dedicated team of Talent Coaches/Sourcers (Lead team of 12 Sourcers) and is accountable for their operational performance
â€¢Accountable for the delivery on the Recruiting Plan. Work closely with HRSS teams to ensure adequate EI slots, CV sourcing and pipeline movement respectively
â€¢Engage business leads/Project leads on regular basis to resolve and clarify any recruitment delivery issues
â€¢Support Recruitment Delivery Lead (DL) for achieving the Recruitment leadership priorities
â€¢Track, identify and ensure productivity and business metrics for each function
â€¢Support DL/Supervisor with Insights, regular reports and recommendations to manage escalations
â€¢Plan for special recruitment drives in collaboration with Business Leads and Supervisorâ€™s guidance to meet targets
â€¢Plan and focus on achieving our key metrics like Diversity, Employee Referrals, Renege management, PwD hiring, Alumni hiring etc

ACHIEVEMENT:
â€¢Successfully met the Media target as a Lead for Q1 (before moving to new role)
â€¢Implemented Digital JD to drive applicants for complex role (Initiative executed first time for the entity)

positions.description: â€¢Leadership Hiring.â€¢Social Media Hiring.â€¢Sourcing, Screening and short listing the candidates based on the requirements.â€¢Create, build, and maintain networks of potential passive candidates to fill future anticipated and planned roles. â€¢Conducting HR discussion for Selected Candidate.â€¢Salary negotiation.â€¢Preparing Job descriptions, give presentations for process improvement.â€¢Coordinating with Practice and Delivery Heads in terms of demand fulfilment, job description updates, obtaining various hiring flexes and clarity.â€¢Organizing and conducting weekend recruitment events.â€¢Interactions with candidates post offer roll outâ€¢Vendor Managementâ€¢Hiring across department within the organisation at PAN India level

positions.subtitle: Boyd & Moore Executive Search
positions.description: Worked with Boyd and Moore Executive Search (HQ â€“ Japan).â€¢Played active role in closing Senior Executive and Management Level roles for MNC Companies in Japan. â€¢Covered other sectors such as IT , Consumer, Automotive,  Life Sciences (Pharmaceutical and Medical Device ) FMCG Companies in Japan.â€¢Team Management.â€¢Suggested innovative ideas to reward the best team / top performerâ€¢Gave presentation on respected vertical to the new employees onboardâ€¢Handled skip level meeting (Interacted with our consultants & MD in japan for process improvement)ACHIEVEMENTSâ€¢In the final assignment I was chosen by the newly created key Accounts Team, run by the BMES Managing Director, to work with IT Team. My commitment helped the team to quickly close a number of placements.â€¢Helped to close a Senior Management role with MSD, this was the biggest placement in Pharmaceutical for which I got appreciation from India as well as from my Senior Consultants in Japan.â€¢Managed a team and Lead the Life Science Division within the Organization
